# bs_icon() returns a SVG string and renders as HTML

    Code
      as.character(globe)
    Output
      [1] "<svg xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/2000/svg\" viewBox=\"0 0 16 16\" class=\"bi bi-globe \" style=\"height:5rem;width:5rem;fill:currentColor;vertical-align:-0.125em;\" aria-hidden=\"true\" role=\"img\" ><path d=\"M0 8a8 8 0 1 1 16 0A8 8 0 0 1 0 8m7.5-6.923c-.67.204-1.335.82-1.887 1.855A8 8 0 0 0 5.145 4H7.5zM4.09 4a9.3 9.3 0 0 1 .64-1.539 7 7 0 0 1 .597-.933A7.03 7.03 0 0 0 2.255 4zm-.582 3.5c.03-.877.138-1.718.312-2.5H1.674a7 7 0 0 0-.656 2.5zM4.847 5a12.5 12.5 0 0 0-.338 2.5H7.5V5zM8.5 5v2.5h2.99a12.5 12.5 0 0 0-.337-2.5zM4.51 8.5a12.5 12.5 0 0 0 .337 2.5H7.5V8.5zm3.99 0V11h2.653c.187-.765.306-1.608.338-2.5zM5.145 12q.208.58.468 1.068c.552 1.035 1.218 1.65 1.887 1.855V12zm.182 2.472a7 7 0 0 1-.597-.933A9.3 9.3 0 0 1 4.09 12H2.255a7 7 0 0 0 3.072 2.472M3.82 11a13.7 13.7 0 0 1-.312-2.5h-2.49c.062.89.291 1.733.656 2.5zm6.853 3.472A7 7 0 0 0 13.745 12H11.91a9.3 9.3 0 0 1-.64 1.539 7 7 0 0 1-.597.933M8.5 12v2.923c.67-.204 1.335-.82 1.887-1.855q.26-.487.468-1.068zm3.68-1h2.146c.365-.767.594-1.61.656-2.5h-2.49a13.7 13.7 0 0 1-.312 2.5m2.802-3.5a7 7 0 0 0-.656-2.5H12.18c.174.782.282 1.623.312 2.5zM11.27 2.461c.247.464.462.98.64 1.539h1.835a7 7 0 0 0-3.072-2.472c.218.284.418.598.597.933M10.855 4a8 8 0 0 0-.468-1.068C9.835 1.897 9.17 1.282 8.5 1.077V4z\"></path></svg>"

---

    Code
      as.character(rocket)
    Output
      [1] "<svg xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/2000/svg\" viewBox=\"0 0 16 16\" class=\"bi bi-rocket text-success mt-1\" style=\"height:7rem;width:7rem;fill:currentColor;vertical-align:-0.125em;border:2px solid red;\" aria-label=\"A rocket ship\" role=\"img\" ><title>A rocket ship</title><path d=\"M8 8c.828 0 1.5-.895 1.5-2S8.828 4 8 4s-1.5.895-1.5 2S7.172 8 8 8\"></path>\n<path d=\"M11.953 8.81c-.195-3.388-.968-5.507-1.777-6.819C9.707 1.233 9.23.751 8.857.454a3.5 3.5 0 0 0-.463-.315A2 2 0 0 0 8.25.064.55.55 0 0 0 8 0a.55.55 0 0 0-.266.073 2 2 0 0 0-.142.08 4 4 0 0 0-.459.33c-.37.308-.844.803-1.31 1.57-.805 1.322-1.577 3.433-1.774 6.756l-1.497 1.826-.004.005A2.5 2.5 0 0 0 2 12.202V15.5a.5.5 0 0 0 .9.3l1.125-1.5c.166-.222.42-.4.752-.57.214-.108.414-.192.625-.281l.198-.084c.7.428 1.55.635 2.4.635s1.7-.207 2.4-.635q.1.044.196.083c.213.09.413.174.627.282.332.17.586.348.752.57l1.125 1.5a.5.5 0 0 0 .9-.3v-3.298a2.5 2.5 0 0 0-.548-1.562zM12 10.445v.055c0 .866-.284 1.585-.75 2.14.146.064.292.13.425.199.39.197.8.46 1.1.86L13 14v-1.798a1.5 1.5 0 0 0-.327-.935zM4.75 12.64C4.284 12.085 4 11.366 4 10.5v-.054l-.673.82a1.5 1.5 0 0 0-.327.936V14l.225-.3c.3-.4.71-.664 1.1-.861.133-.068.279-.135.425-.199M8.009 1.073q.096.06.226.163c.284.226.683.621 1.09 1.28C10.137 3.836 11 6.237 11 10.5c0 .858-.374 1.48-.943 1.893C9.517 12.786 8.781 13 8 13s-1.517-.214-2.057-.607C5.373 11.979 5 11.358 5 10.5c0-4.182.86-6.586 1.677-7.928.409-.67.81-1.082 1.096-1.32q.136-.113.236-.18Z\"></path>\n<path d=\"M9.479 14.361c-.48.093-.98.139-1.479.139s-.999-.046-1.479-.139L7.6 15.8a.5.5 0 0 0 .8 0z\"></path></svg>"
